message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously crafted to provide exceptional value. This item is worth more than $100 to me, and I believe it could be a great addition to your collection. Let's start with an offer of $150. Looking forward to your response!
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the value you place on this product. I am willing to pay up to $120 for it. Looking forward to your response!

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand your valuation of the product and appreciate your willingness to meet my initial asking price. After careful consideration, I would like to counter with an offer of $140. I hope this aligns better with your budget while still reflecting the value I place on this product.
Hello Alice, I've considered your latest offer and am willing to pay $130 for the product. I hope this aligns better with your valuation while staying within my budget.

Thank you for your response, Bob. I appreciate your effort to find a mutually agreeable price. After further reflection, I would like to counter with an offer of $135. I believe this reflects the value of the product while remaining competitive with your offer.
Hello Alice, I've reviewed your offer and am willing to pay $132 for the product. I hope this offer is acceptable and brings us closer to a fair agreement.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I'm glad we're making progress. After considering your latest proposal, I would like to counter with an offer of $133. I hope this slight adjustment will help us reach an agreement that respects both our positions.
Hello Alice, I appreciate your efforts to adjust the price. I am willing to pay $131 for the product. I hope this offer is within your considerations and brings us closer to a final agreement.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand your position and appreciate your willingness to negotiate. After careful consideration, I would like to counter with an offer of $132. I believe this is a fair compromise that respects both our interests.
